question: Which country has signed the Arab Accord along with UAE and Bahrain?
explanation:
Israel, United Arab Emirates and Bahrain have signed the Arab Accord. It is the first Arab - Israel accord in 26 years.
The signing ceremony was held at White House, USA in an event hosted by the President Donald Trump. As per the agreements, UAE and Bahrain will establish embassies, exchange ambassadors, cooperate and work together with Israel.
